pages.text: The $(bold)Ancient Research Team$(), or A.R.T. for short, is funded by the Spades University after our initial findings that revealed a rich past that was lying under our fingertips.$(br2)We have been committed to this cause for many years and have uncovered many things, and do not plan on stopping prematurely.
As more about the Ancients are discovered, the Almanac will be updated accordingly.$(br2)If you'd like support the foundation, or simply have any questions, lightly tap the bottom of this page.
